input.sentences: it 's a wet day but fans still attend the game .
the camera crew dressed in rain gear .
the stands are full of cheering fans .
the conductor leads the band in a fight song .
output.sentences: At the game, the fans got wet.
Luckily, they were dressed in their rain gear.
The rain didn't stop the fans from cheering in the stands.
The marching band played very well.
The band lead the fight song.
